parameters.name: Amy
parameters.teaser: 5 m/o girl, previously healthy, has been vomiting for 4 days and is now refusing feeds.
parameters.clinical_descrip: 5 m/o girl, previously healthy, has been vomiting for 4 days, with 5 episodes of dark green emesis, now refusing feeds.  She was initially inconsolable, but now she is lethargic with intermittent crying when drawing her legs up. Temperature 101, Pulse 140. She passed a bloody stool as you were about to place the catheter.
